DEFCON 1 Nuclear War is imminent.
§RDEFCON 2§W Further increase in force readiness, nukes are on alert and ready.
§YDEFCON 3§W Increase in force readiness above that required for normal readiness.

§BDEFCON 5§W Lowest state of readiness.

The Doomsday Clock is a symbolic clock face maintained by the board of directors of the Bulletin of the Atomic Scientists. The closer the clock is to midnight, the closer the world is to global nuclear war.
